## URouter.addListener() method

单独监听路由的 `change` 事件，通常无需这么做，推荐直接在 model 中利用 [effect()](./vue-web.effect.md) 监听

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addListener(name: 'change', callback: (data: {
        routeState: RouteState;
        root: boolean;
    }) => void | Promise<void>): UNListener;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | 'change' |  |
|  callback | (data: { routeState: [RouteState](./vue-web.routestate.md)<!-- -->; root: boolean; }) =&gt; void \| Promise&lt;void&gt; |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

[UNListener](./vue-web.unlistener.md)
